transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good morning sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi.
Customer: Haan boliye na madam.
Executive: Actually sir mujhe Santosh ji se baat karni hai.
Customer: Santosh ji se baat karni hai reason kya hai madam reason batayenge mere ko.
Executive: Mujhe mujhe haan haan sir actually na hamare yahan pe se unse baat hua hoga unhone feedback negative di hai to mujhe wahi tha ki kya exactly issue raha jiski wajah se unhone negative feedback di hai sir.
Customer: Madam wo aapko Nandini madam phone kar rahi hai aapki kya naam kya hai aapka naam?
Executive: Mera naam Himani hai sir.
Customer: Madam hamare yahan wo ek to do kam ho rahe hain ek to usme photo wagera dal rahi hai madam to unko proper response nahi mil raha aapke yahan se call kar rahe hain kuch response nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Pehla baat dusra baat jo leads ki baat hui thi koi aisi lead aa hi nahi rahi hai consumer ki lead aati hai madam.
Executive: Ek second main dekh leti hun sir aap wo mam dekhte hain kya mam ka number hoga.
Customer: Koi nahi koi nahi madam abhi sir aayenge sir aayenge 12 baje tak to aap 12 baje tak call kare main aapko sir se hi baat kara dunga fir aapki mam se baat kar lijiyega to aap dekh lijiyega jaisa bhi hua.
Executive: Haan please thoda urgent hai isi se mujhe baat kara dijiyega kyunki jo bhi issues hai dekho sir baith ke theek kar lenge kyunki hame na pata nahi chalta.
Customer: Madam response to aana response to aana chahiye madam.
Executive: Definitely sir ho hi nahi sakta hamare sir tabhi to main bol rahi hun aisa kya hua jo response nahi hota.
Customer: Screenshot bheju madam screenshot bheju din mein kitni bar call karte hain hum log screenshot bhej de raha hun aapko.
Executive: Sir main dekhti hun kis number pe karte ho main wo bhi to check karungi na sir.
Customer: Okay sir okay sir aayenge 12 baje tak main aapko karta hun.
Executive: Haan main wait karti hun thank you so much.
Customer: Okay theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting proper response.

- Consumer leads are coming instead of business leads.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to connect with senior at 12 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- response, leads, follow up
